yad dvA#daSAqhastAM ~MvicCi#ndyuqryanmaddhyE# &tirAqtraM kuqryuru#paqdAsu#kA gRuqhapa#tEqrvAK syA#-duqpari#ShTAcCandOqmAnA$M mahAvraqtaM ku#rvantiq saMta#tAmEqva vAcaqmava# rundhaqtE&nu#padAsukA gRuqhapa#tEqrvAg-Ba#vati paqSavOq vai Ca#ndOqmA anna#M mahAvraqtaM ~Myaduqpari#ShTAcCandOqmAnA$M mahAvraqtaM kuqrvanti# paqSuShu# caiqvAnnAdyE# caq prati# tiShThanti || 8 
(vita#tAq - trica#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A3)
